brief_title: A Study of the Pharmacokinetics of Black Cohosh
brief_summary: Black cohosh is a natural supplement that has been used to treat and prevent menopausal symptoms. Remifemin is a standardized form of black cohosh. The purpose of this study is to determine the levels of components of black cohosh obtained in the blood of healthy women taking Remifemin.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - No prior diagnosis of cancer other than non-melanoma skin cancer or carcinoma in-situ of the cervix - No current prescription medication use - Negative urine pregnancy test OR greater than age 50 with no menses for at least one year OR documented status post hysterectomy - Competent to understand and sign informed consent
